org.treetank.service.xml.xpath

Class XPathError

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • org.treetank.service.xml.xpath.XPathError
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class XPathError
extends RuntimeException

    XPathError

    XPath error as described in XQuery 1.0 and XPath 2.0 Error Codes .

    A static error is an error that must be detected during the static analysis.

    A dynamic error is an error that must be detected during the dynamic evaluation phase and may be detected during the static analysis phase.

    A type error may be raised during the static analysis phase or the dynamic evaluation phase.

    The errors are identified by QNames that have the form err:XPYYnnnn, where:

  • err denotes the namespace for XPath and XQuery errors.
  • XP identifies the error as an XPath error.
  • YY denotes the error category, using the following encoding: ST denotes a static error. DY denotes a dynamic error. TY denotes a type error. nnnn is a unique numeric code.
